import{useEffect}from"react";import{withRouter}from"react-router-dom";var ScrollToTop=function ScrollToTop(_ref){var children=_ref.children,pathname=_ref.location.pathname;useEffect(function(){window.scrollTo({top:0,left:0// behavior: "smooth"
